metadata.Title: CVE-2021-30465 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - high.
metadata.Description:
runc before 1.0.0-rc95 allows a Container Filesystem Breakout via Directory Traversal. To exploit the vulnerability, an attacker must be able to create multiple containers with a fairly specific mount configuration. The problem occurs via a symlink-exchange attack that relies on a race condition.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-30465` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

runc - 1.0.0~rc7+git20190403.029124da-0ubuntu1~16.04.4+esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: runc package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.0~rc7+git20190403.029124da-0ubuntu1~16.04.4+esm2').
